title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\DiskConfig
name: DiskConfig
description:
Specifies the config of disk options for a group of VM instances.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.DiskConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.boot_disk_type
params.description: Optional. Type of the boot disk (default is "pd-standard"). Valid values: "pd-balanced" (Persistent Disk Balanced Solid State Drive), "pd-ssd" (Persistent Disk Solid State Drive), or "pd-standard" (Persistent Disk Hard Disk Drive). See Disk types.

params.name: data.boot_disk_size_gb
params.description: Optional. Size in GB of the boot disk (default is 500GB).

params.name: data.num_local_ssds
params.description: Optional. Number of attached SSDs, from 0 to 4 (default is 0). If SSDs are not attached, the boot disk is used to store runtime logs and HDFS data. If one or more SSDs are attached, this runtime bulk data is spread across them, and the boot disk contains only basic config and installed binaries.

params.name: data.local_ssd_interface
params.description: Optional. Interface type of local SSDs (default is "scsi"). Valid values: "scsi" (Small Computer System Interface), "nvme" (Non-Volatile Memory Express). See local SSD performance.

methods.name: getBootDiskType
methods.description:
Optional. Type of the boot disk (default is "pd-standard").

Valid values: "pd-balanced" (Persistent Disk Balanced Solid State Drive), "pd-ssd" (Persistent Disk Solid State Drive), or "pd-standard" (Persistent Disk Hard Disk Drive). See Disk types.

Generated from protobuf field string boot_disk_type = 3 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];

methods.name: getNumLocalSsds
methods.description:
Optional. Number of attached SSDs, from 0 to 4 (default is 0).

If SSDs are not attached, the boot disk is used to store runtime logs and HDFS data. If one or more SSDs are attached, this runtime bulk data is spread across them, and the boot disk contains only basic config and installed binaries.
